attributes.action: fund the maintanence, genral upkeep and improvment of public skate parks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
skate park nowadays are in a state, for example at my local skate park it is always flooded and teh council havent done any thing half of the ramps are either missing panels or have broken panels on them. it took them about a mounth to come and fix a huge hole in the top of the half pipe before so i feel we need better funding.

they dont seem to have a problem upkeeping a feild for football why should our sport be cast aside?
